syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
    // ========== UI/UX & Visual ==========
    "editor.fontFamily": "HackHack Nerd Font, JetBrainsMono Nerd Font",
    "editor.fontSize": 13,
    "editor.fontWeight": "600",
    "editor.fontLigatures": true,
    "editor.cursorSmoothCaretAnimation": "on",
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "editor.renderWhitespace": "boundary",
    "editor.lineNumbers": "interval",
    "editor.stickyScroll.enabled": true,
    "editor.hover.sticky": true,
    "editor.guides.bracketPairs": "active",

    "workbench.colorTheme": "Default Dark+",
    "workbench.iconTheme": "symbols",
    "workbench.productIconTheme": "fluent-icons",
    "workbench.sideBar.location": "right",
    "workbench.startupEditor": "newUntitledFile",
    "workbench.editor.tabActionLocation": "left",
    "workbench.fontAliasing": "antialiased",
    "workbench.list.smoothScrolling": true,
    "workbench.editor.highlightModifiedTabs": true,
    "workbench.editor.closeOnFileDelete": true,
    "workbench.editor.limit.enabled": true,
    "workbench.editor.limit.perEditorGroup": true,
    "workbench.editor.limit.value": 5,

    // ========== Terminal ==========
    "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "Operator Mono, Consolas, 'Courier New', monospace",
    "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 15,
    "terminal.integrated.fontWeight": "600",
    "terminal.integrated.cursorStyle": "line",
    "terminal.integrated.cursorBlinking": true,
    "terminal.integrated.persistentSessionReviveProcess": "never",
    "terminal.integrated.tabs.enabled": true,
    "terminal.integrated.sendKeybindingsToShell": true,

    // ========== Git & Source Control ==========
    "git.autofetch": true,
    "git.confirmSync": false,
    "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
    "git.untrackedChanges": "separate",

    // ========== Editor Behavior ==========
    "files.eol": "\n",
    "files.insertFinalNewline": true,
    "files.simpleDialog.enable": true,
    "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
        "source.fixAll": "never",
        "source.fixAll.eslint": "explicit",
        "source.organizeImports": "never"
    },

    // ========== Extensions Config ==========
    "eslint.validate": [
        "javascript", "javascriptreact", "typescript", "typescriptreact",
        "vue", "html", "markdown", "json", "jsonc", "yaml", "toml"
    ],
    "eslint.rules.customizations": [
        { "rule": "style/*", "severity": "off" },
        { "rule": "*quotes", "severity": "off" },
        { "rule": "*semi", "severity": "off" }
    ],
    "github.copilot.enable": {
        "*": false,
        "plaintext": false,
        "markdown": true,
        "scminput": false,
        "python": false
    },
    "prettier.enable": false,
    "prettier.printWidth": 200,
    "prettier.semi": false,
    "prettier.singleQuote": true,

    // ========== File Explorer ==========
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
    "explorer.fileNesting.enabled": true,
    "explorer.fileNesting.expand": false,
    "explorer.fileNesting.patterns": {},

    // ========== Spell Checker ==========
    "cSpell.allowCompoundWords": false,
    "cSpell.language": "es, es_ES",

    // ========== Python ==========
    "python.defaultInterpreterPath": "C:\\Users\\Izzy\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python312\\python.exe",
    "[python]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-python.autopep8"
    },
    "flake8.args": ["--max-line-length=120"],

    // ========== Misc ==========
    "editor.suggestSelection": "first",
    "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
    "editor.multiCursorModifier": "ctrlCmd",
    "editor.wordSeparators": "`~!@#%^&*()=+[{]}\\|;:'\",.<>/?",
    "debug.onTaskErrors": "debugAnyway",
    "diffEditor.ignoreTrimWhitespace": false,
    "settingsSync.ignoredExtensions": [
        "eamodio.gitlens",
        "ms-python.pylint",
        "mintlify.document",
        "xabikos.javascriptsnippets",
        "github.copilot-chat",
        "github.copilot",
        "alexcvzz.vscode-sqlite",
        "formulahendry.vscode-mysql",
        "cweijan.vscode-mysql-client2",
        "cweijan.dbclient-jdbc"
    ],
    "window.autoDetectColorScheme": true,
    "window.dialogStyle": "custom",
    "window.nativeTabs": true,
    "window.title": "${rootName}",
    "editor.tokenColorCustomizations": {
        "textMateRules": [
            {
                "scope": [
                    "comment",
                    "keyword",
                    "storage",
                    "entity.name.function",
                    "entity.name.type",
                    "variable.language.this",
                    "variable.language.super"
                ],
                "settings": {
                    "fontStyle": "italic"
                }
            },
            {
                "scope": [
                    "variable.other.property",
                    "variable.other.object.property",
                    "entity.name.tag",
                    "entity.other.attribute-name",
                    "support.function",
                    "support.constant"
                ],
                "settings": {
                    "fontStyle": "bold"
                }
            },
            {
                "scope": "constant.numeric",
                "settings": {
                    "fontStyle": ""
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    "workbench.colorCustomizations": {},
    "database-client.autoSync": true,
    "workbench.preferredDarkColorTheme": "Default Dark+",
    "[lua]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "yinfei.luahelper"
    },
}"}
